risk_description: Mobile OS battery optimization protocols (iOS/Android) aggressively terminating background location services, causing failure of the 'Travel Mode' tracking feature (WI-MOB-TECH-002) and violating the <2s latency requirement.
root_cause: Native operating system battery saving heuristics killing long-running background threads.
mitigation_strategy: Implement platform-specific native modules (e.g., foreground services on Android, significant location change service on iOS) with 'Always On' permission requests; Implement heartbeat mechanism to detect termination.
contingency_plan: Fallback to lower-frequency 'ping' updates via silent push notifications (FCM) to wake the app instead of persistent WebSocket streams.
monitoring_trigger: Technician location update gaps exceeding 60 seconds in production telemetry.

risk_description: Azure AD B2C Custom Policy complexity and XML configuration errors leading to authentication failures, token claim inaccuracies, or delays in implementing MFA and account lockout logic (WI-AUTH-001).
root_cause: High complexity of Identity Experience Framework (IEF) XML and lack of local debugging tools for B2C.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate a dedicated Identity Specialist; Implement automated B2C policy upload/validation in CI/CD; Create a standalone 'Identity Lab' tenant for isolated policy testing.
contingency_plan: Revert to standard User Flows with reduced customization if Custom Policies prove too unstable for launch, deferring custom lockout logic.
monitoring_trigger: Authentication failure rate > 1% or reported login loop issues during QA.

risk_description: Offline data synchronization conflicts (WatermelonDB/SQLite) resulting in data loss or state inconsistency when technicians reconnect after field work, specifically impacting job status updates and signature capture (WI-MOB-TECH-001).
root_cause: Concurrency issues between local optimistic UI updates and server-side state changes during network partition.
mitigation_strategy: Implement 'Last-Write-Wins' conflict resolution strategy for simple fields; Design idempotent API endpoints for queue processing; create a 'Sync Audit' log on device.
contingency_plan: Implement a manual 'Force Sync' UI for technicians to resolve stuck queues by overwriting local state with server state (or vice-versa).
monitoring_trigger: Client-side error logs indicating 'Sync Conflict' or 'Queue Processing Failure'.

risk_description: Real-time WebSocket Gateway (WI-RT-001) failing to handle 10,000 concurrent connections, leading to message drops or high latency, violating the <2s update requirement.
root_cause: Single-node bottleneck in WebSocket handling or Redis Adapter saturation.
mitigation_strategy: Implement Redis Adapter for socket.io/NestJS Gateway immediately; Configure Azure SignalR Service as a fully managed offload option; Stress test with k6 early.
contingency_plan: Migrate from self-hosted NestJS Gateway to Azure SignalR Service managed instance to offload connection management.
monitoring_trigger: WebSocket connection counts approaching 5k per pod or latency exceeding 500ms.

risk_description: Azure AI Document Intelligence (OCR) latency or failure rates causing timeouts in the product registration flow (WI-BE-PROD-001), blocking user onboarding.
root_cause: Synchronous dependency on external AI service which varies in processing time.
mitigation_strategy: Decouple OCR process: Upload invoice -> Return 'Processing' status -> Webhook/Polling updates client when OCR completes; Implement Circuit Breaker.
contingency_plan: Enable 'Manual Entry' fallback UI immediately if OCR service circuit breaker trips or times out > 5s.

risk_description: PostGIS point-in-polygon queries (WI-BE-SRV-001) degrading database performance under high load during service request routing, impacting overall system responsiveness.
root_cause: Complex spatial joins on unoptimized geometry indices or large polygon datasets.
mitigation_strategy: Ensure GiST indices are applied to geometry columns; Implement caching for service center coverage areas; Offload read queries to Read Replicas.
contingency_plan: Simplify polygon geometries (reduce vertices) or fall back to simple postal code matching if spatial queries become a bottleneck.
monitoring_trigger: Database CPU usage > 80% during routing operations or query execution time > 200ms.
